column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " What 's going on ?
#Text=These are great masters and friends of ours .
#Text=Pakku .
#Text=" Pakku says : " It is respectful to bow to an old master , but how about a hug for your new grandfather ?
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's so exciting !
#Text=You and Gran - Gran must be so happy to have found each other again !
#Text=" Pakku says : " I made her a new betrothal necklace and everything .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Welcome to the family , Gramp - Gramp !
#Text=" Pakku says : " You can still just call me Pakku .
#Text=" Sokka says : " How about Grand - Pakku ?
#Text=" Pakku says : " No .
#Text=" Katara says : " And this was Aang 's first firebending teacher .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Jeong Jeong .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Master Piandao .
#Text=" Piandao says : " Hello , Sokka .
#Text=" Suki says : " So wait .
#Text=How do you all know each other ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " All old people know each other .
#Text=Do n't you know that ?
#Text=" Piandao says : " We 're all part of the same ancient secret society .
#Text=A group that transcends the divisions of the four nations .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The Order of the White Lotus .
#Text=" Bumi says : " That 's the one .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " The White Lotus has always been about philosophy and beauty and truth .
#Text=But about a month ago , a call went out that we were needed for something important .
#Text=" Pakku says : " It came from a Grand Lotus : your uncle , Iroh of the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Toph says : " Well , that 's who we 're looking for .
#Text=" Piandao says : " Then we 'll take you to him .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Wait !
#Text=Someone 's missing from your group .
#Text=Someone very important .
#Text=Where 's Momo ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " He 's gone .
#Text=And so is Aang .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Oh well .
#Text=So long as they have each other , I 'm sure we have nothing to worry about .
#Text=Let 's go !
#Text=" Aang says : " Avatar Kyoshi .
#Text=I need your wisdom .
#Text=" Kyoshi says : " In my day , Chin the Conqueror threatened to throw the world out of balance .
#Text=I stopped him .
#Text=And the world entered a great era of peace .
#Text=" Aang says : " You did n't really kill Chin .
#Text=Technically , he fell to his own doom because he was too stubborn to get out of the way .
#Text=" Kyoshi says : " Personally , I do n't really see the difference , but I assure you , I would have done whatever it took to stop Chin .
#Text=I offer you this wisdom , Aang : Only justice will bring peace .
#Text=" Aang says : " I knew I should n't have asked Kyoshi .
#Text="
